titleStmt.title: Delightful novels exemplifyed in eight choice and elegant histories lately related by the most refined wits ; with interludes in which are comprised the gallant adventures, amorous intrigues and famous enterprizes of several English gentry ; with the most pathetick oratory and subtil stratagems used in love-affairs.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
